name: SwannSecurity
0:
”Alexa, show the front door.”
”Alexa, go home.”
”Alexa, discover devices.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Swann Security skill allows you to monitor your home security at any time. Using Alexa voice commands, you can show Swann Security Cameras on Amazon devices. You may view the live feed of any connected camera by simply asking Alexa to show it on your Echo Spot, Show or FireTV. To get started, use the Amazon Alexa smartphone app, link the ‘Swann Security’ Smart Home Skill and sign in with your Swann Security credentials.

To configure this skill, please do the following;
1. Make sure that your cameras are online and operating correctly via the Swann Security smartphone app.
2. Select the 'Enable Skill' button to link this Skill
3. Login using your Swann Security credentials
4. Select ‘Discover Devices’ to find available cameras on your account
5. Please ensure that your Swann Smart Security System is using the latest firmware by upgrading it through the System interface
5. You can now use the skill by requesting to see the respective camera name. 

Some example commands are;
 * “Alexa, show the front door“
 * “Alexa, show the back door”
 * “Alexa, go home.”

More information is available at http://www.swann.com/voicecontrol/
For any technical issues, please contact tech@swann.com

Compatible Amazon Alexa Devices:
* Echo Spot
* Echo Show
* Fire TV [ Fire OS 6.0 onwards ]
